dji.sdk.api.RemoteController

Class DJIRemoteControllerMasterInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • dji.sdk.api.RemoteController.DJIRemoteControllerMasterInfo

  • public class DJIRemoteControllerMasterInfo
extends java.lang.Object

    DJI Remote Controller Master Info

    This is a structure designed for holding the information of master remote controller. The ID attribute will be used for setting up the master mode.
    Version:
    : V2.4.0
    Author:
    : DJI Software
